brief_title: Gene Expression Study of TLR Responses on Dendritic Cells
description: Cytokine and gene expression profile after TLR activation of dendritic cells.
hypothesis: The innate immune responses following TLR receptor activation are driven at the transcription level, and lead to the modulation of transcription of a big group of genes.
objectives: Characterization of the cytokine/chemokine and gene expression profile after TLR receptor activation.
official_title: Gene Expression Study of TLR Responses on Dendritic Cells

arm.description: C57BL6/J female mice, FLT3-L treatment, 20ug/200ul/mouse/day for 9days
arm.name: FLT3 treated B6 mice

arm.description: p53-knockout C57BL/6 mouse, donor of JAWS II cell line, GM-CSF-dependent DC line established from bone marrow cells
arm.name: mice for JAWS II cell line

program.contract_name: Multiscale Systems Immunology for Adjuvant Development
